caption.center: ROSA DEMUTH, ROSA DEMUTH by MARIE GRISSETTE, her Next Friend, MARIE
GRISSETTE as Natural Guardian of Rosa Demuth, URBAN KLENKE, as Administrator
of the Estate of Carl Demuth, deceased, Appellees, v. EVELYN G. DEMUTH and

opinion.posture: Appeal from Ford district court; ERNEST M. VIEUX, judge. Opinion filed May 10, 1975.
opinion.attorneys:
Byron G. Larson, of Williams, Larson, Voss, Strobel and Estes, of Dodge City, was on the brief for the appellants.
Harry A. Waite, of Dodge City, was on the brief for the appellees.
